Package camzup.core

Interface IOriented2

All Known Implementing Classes:
CamEntity2, CurveEntity2, Entity2, ImageEntity2, MaterialPImage, MaterialUv, MeshEntity2, TextEntity2, Transform2
public interface IOriented2
Maintains consistent behavior for 2D objects that can be rotated.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    float
    getRotation()
    Gets the object's rotation.
    IOriented2
    rotateTo(float rotNew)
    Rotates this object to an angle.
    IOriented2
    rotateTo(float rotNew, float step)
    Rotates this object to an angle over a step in time.
    IOriented2
    rotateZ(float radians)
    Rotates this object by an angle around the z axis.
